resources.string: \t This is an app that allows people to join and share information that they feel others may want to be aware of. For instance when driving you might find that a person has a blinker out, maybe their car’s tags are expired, perhaps their gas cap is open? Other situations are perhaps a pot hole that needs to be fixed.

\t As you post things you start off essentially a “Good” Samaritan. That is, you have a positive score. As you post things others can rank your post as good, neutral, or bad. Neutral posts will give you no points, a good score will give you +1, and bad -1. \n\n\t The point of the app is rather similar to the Greek idea of being “good” or having Virtue. The idea being that to be the best that yourself can be is what is considered good. Through this idea users can use the app to help others through providing information that may be unknown to those individuals.

[1.] If someone is found to be “stalking” another they’re account will be banned and the individual who is being stocked will be notified. 
	 	 [a.] They will have to submit information explaining and proving why they were posting or subscribing to the items they were. 
	 	 [b.] Or, the stalked person will have to allow them (Maybe it’s not stalking but a spouse who also wants to be alerted to the same items) 
	 [2.] If pictures of nude, illicit, or degrading material are posted, they will be removed and the user will have a Samaritan score reduction of 1/5 of their total points (or 25 points) whichever is greater. Account will be on warning for 3 months. 
	 [3.] Bullying: Same as above, 1/5 or 25 points, account warning for 3 months. 
	 [4.] Repetitive issues
